review: This thing performs way better than expected i use it for everything
author: Chris Perez

review: Love the chromecast ! Sometimes it freezes, but I think this has more to do with our poor internet connection than the device.
author: Kimberly M. Knudosn

review: Works intermittently. Possible compatibility issue with 8 yr old router. Router works fine with all Apple/Samsung/HP/Dell products.
author: JR

review: Replaced the Directv in our bedroom using this item. It's saving me money every day just sitting there since I no longer pay a monthly fee to have a HD box in it's place.
author: cwgabbert

review: Awesome. Everything is in order. I got it. It's working. No hassle... Thanks!
author: Henri Ngui Hwa Hock

review: Works great with Android but not with IPhone.Pretty disappointing (but not surprising) that Apple charges for an app to make it work.
author: Randy B

review: Good concept but doesn't perform well. It's slow, there's a 2 sec delay between your chromecast broadcast and the video on your TV. The broadcast image isn't clear. I wish I could give this product a better review but I honestly can't.
author: Packdiddy
